column2: "Task 2:<yellow>Hit the enemy with a counterattack after a Just Guard<c>"

"・Just before the attack hits
\u3000press <%WeaponAction> to guard
・Press <%WeaponAction> again to counter"

"・Just before the attack hits
\u3000press <%MainPaletteC> to guard
・Press <%MainPaletteC> again to counter"
